module: Module-level comment: The "altera_up_video_fb_color_rom" module serves as a color lookup table in video processing, mapping a 4-bit color index to 10-bit RGB outputs using a ROM. It operates synchronized to 'clk' and controlled by 'clk_en'. The ROM, initialized from "altera_up_video_fb_color_rom.mif", is interfaced through an 'altsyncram' instance set for ROM mode, outputting color data split into RGB components via internal signal 'color_data'.
